article_title: Destiny, P.T. And Why The Best Games Of The Summer Were Ads

article_metadata.author: Paul Tassi

og.description: I'm currently listening to the soothing sounds of my PS4 homescreen, a necessary break after spending the better part of the last hour listening to laughing babies and croaking dead women in the P.T. "playable trailer" for Silent Hills. I finally hooked up my PS4 after a lengthy move and was [...]
